channel.title: How do you make it so that you need to download client?
channel.description: I have a 508 bulby based server and im having problems with people using Cheatclients and other stuff i dont want them to on my server. Someone please help me to make it so that i can do this. I think it has something to do with something called UID? Please help!!

item.description:

hint:

item.title: How do you make it so that you need to download client?
item.dc:creator: @djdoyle1 djdoyle1
item.description:
@djdoyle1 wrote:

In your login method.
Declare UID

if(UID != “whattheuidyourclientuseshere”) {
}
